traditional.translation[0].definitions[0: being part of the traditions of a country or group of people
a traditional method of brewing beer
It is traditional not to eat meat on Good Friday.
it is traditional (for somebody) to do something
traditional.translation[0].definitions[1: following ideas and methods that have existed for a long time, rather than doing anything new or different
He has a traditional view of women.
I went to a very traditional school.
